The Hiring and Firing Question and Answer Book

Amacom | Paul Falcone | 
224 pages | Dec 12, 2007 |ISBN: 0814406408 | PDF | 2.36 Mb

Getting the best employees on board and weeding out the worst-- without getting slapped with expensive lawsuits--are two of the most crucial and difficult jobs of human resources professionals and general managers...
